title: Final Review & Test Readiness
objectives: Reinforce the most-missed topics: right-of-way, signs/markings, speed/space, and special situations.
Apply test-taking strategies: careful reading, eliminating distractors, and time management.
Prepare required documents and logistics for the DMV knowledge test.
Adopt a safe driving mindset beyond the test: maturity, responsibility, and continuous learning.

lessons.title: Read, Predict, Eliminate
content: Read the entire question, predict the answer, and eliminate clearly wrong choices. Watch for absolutes like 'always' or 'never'.

lessons.title: Time & Stress Management
content: Pace yourself. If stuck, mark and return. Use breathing techniques to stay calm and focused.

lessons.title: Right-of-Way & Intersections
content: Yield to pedestrians in crosswalks, to vehicles already in the intersection, and to the right at 4-way stops when arriving simultaneously.

lessons.title: Signs, Markings & Speed/Space
content: Know regulatory vs. warning signs. Respect solid/double lines, and maintain safe following distance appropriate to speed and conditions.

lessons.title: Documents & Eligibility
content: Bring required identification, application receipts, and any forms specified by your DMV appointment confirmation.

lessons.title: Retakes & Next Steps
content: Understand retake policies and waiting periods. If you donâ€™t pass, review missed topics before trying again.

lessons.title: Maturity, Judgment & Risk
content: Real driving is more than passing a test; it requires restraint, patience, and respect for others.

lessons.title: Pledge & Continuous Learning
content: Commit to lifelong learning: refresh the handbook, practice new skills, and keep your vehicle maintained.
